greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of series expansion of the e.g.f. for the Catalan numbers.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..480
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Catalan Number
mathematica: With[{m = 30}, CoefficientList[Series[Exp[2*x]*(BesselI[0, 2*x] - BesselI[1, 2*x]), {x, 0, m}], x]]//Denominator (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 17 2019 *)
program: (PARI) vector(30, n, n--; denominator(binomial(2*n,n)/(n+1)!)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 17 2019
(Sage) [denominator(binomial(2*n,n)/factorial(n+1)) for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 17 2019
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Sep 13 2008
